extendedInfo.description: â Free Full Length Classic Movies â Movie Vault has been designed from scratch for Android to give you the best possible movie watching experience. Now you can watch great feature length films that feature some of the best actors, actresses, and directors over the last hundred years with more movies being added every day. For those of you on the Xoom and other tablets, we are working on allowing fullscreen, stay tuned for an update!!FEATURESâ Stream over 1000 movies to your device with nothing more to buy!â Simple to use interface with custom designed shelves for each Genre!â Save movies to your Queue to watch them later!!â True Cover Art and movie information fed directly from IMDB!â Browse movies by Genre or Search by Keyword, Actor Name, Title, Director, and more.â Automatic updates of movie listing without app upgrade.COMING SOON- Tons of new movies are being added all the time!- Save your position in movie between watches.- Different ways of navigating (Year, Actor, and more).- Much, much, more!!!SUPPORTIf you have questions or need help, then please visit us at http://www.flingsoft.com/movievault/. If you find any technical issues with the movie streams, then please mail us at support@flingsoft.com with the movie in question. NOTE: If you are experiencing an issue where movies will not play, please confirm that you have a decent connection and signal strength before posting a negative review. Most of the time the lack of playback is due to a network connection issue. If you have a solid connection, then please mail us with the movie name so we can help resolve he issue.MOVIE INFORMATIONAll movies contained within the Movie Vault application are Public Domain works as classified under Creative Commons. More information can be found at http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain/. If you have any questions or concerns related to the use of a particular film, then please contact us at support@flingsoft.com. We would be happy to help.NOTE ON MOVIE QUALITYMany people have commented on the quality of the movies, so please keep in mind these are not DVD quality films. First, many of these films never found their way to digital, so what you are seeing is actual first cut from film, tape, or other. Next, they are being streamed from the server so we are limited in the quality we can provide. We are doing our best to improve, but many of these films are rare which is why we feel this app is so special.FEEDBACKWe would love to hear your feedback on the app, so please tell us what features you would like to see added. Also, let us know if you have found great movies out in the wild that you think we should add to the collection.Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/flingsoftguys

reviews.title: Needs more genres
reviews.comment: This app would be amazing if developer can add more genres; Such as: - Short Films - Experimental / Avant-garde films  It would make the app so useful for film enthusiasts.  Also please add full screen to tablets or tabphones like Galaxy Note + Add option for image to flip horizontally depending on how you hold the phone horizontally.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: OnResume() and or OnPause() issue. Black screen is shown upon video Activity being shown again. HTC Incedible /w Android 2.2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app...
reviews.comment: ...if it worked on my android tablet that is. I like this app a lotand it has a great selection of classic movies but I don\'t know why they don\'t make it so it works full screen with tablets? It will definitely get 5 stars from me when it does.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! Lots of fun, \"B\" movies, but also some pretty decent films too. Well worth the modest cost to choose from 1,000 movies.

reviews.title: Full screen for tablets!!!!!
reviews.comment: The list of movies is really pretty good, many not found on the usual \"classic movie\" type sites/apps.****UPDATE:  The screen issue with the tablets appears to be fixed!  App now works properly and with right screen size for both my 10\" and my 7\" tablets.  THANK YOU!!!  Fun app, plays perfectly!

reviews.comment: Used to work fairly well. Now says \"Movie not available.\" Poor excuse for a paid app.
